resolution: Function SocketQUICStream_transition_recv() is already fully implemented in src/quic/SocketQUICStream-state.c at lines 295-335. The implementation follows RFC 9000 Section 3.2 and includes all required state transitions: Recv -> SizeKnown (on RECV_FIN), Recv -> ResetRecvd (on RECV_RESET), SizeKnown -> DataRecvd (on ALL_DATA_RECVD), SizeKnown -> ResetRecvd (on RECV_RESET), DataRecvd -> DataRead (on APP_READ_DATA), and ResetRecvd -> ResetRead (on APP_READ_RESET). Comprehensive tests exist in src/test/test_quic_stream_state.c covering all transitions, edge cases, and error conditions.
